bedbaseRClient 0.0.4
  • Get started
  • Reference

query a bedbase bigbed file

query_bb.Rd

query a bedbase bigbed file

query_bb(md5sum, ...)

Arguments

md5sum

character(1) md5sum used as key into bedbase resources
...

passed to rtracklayer::import.bb, which will have format="bigBed" set

Examples

b1 = query_bb(md5sum="78c0e4753d04b238fc07e4ebe5a02984", 
    which=GenomicRanges::GRanges("chr17:37000000-39000000"))
b1
